ModMetaData.name: No Random Construction Quality
ModMetaData.author: Ben
ModMetaData.description:
This mod simply overrides the random quality rolls when you build furniture/items and instead uses a static function to determine what quality the resulting item is.
Skill Level Range:Resulting Item Quality 0-3 Awful 4-7 Poor 8-10 Normal 11-13 Good 14-16 Excellent 17-19 Masterwork 20-20 Legendary
